scripts.build:server: mkdir -p dist/server/private/streams && mkdir -p dist/server/configs && cp src/private/streams/* dist/server/private/streams/ && cp src/configs/* dist/server/configs/ && rollup -c rollup.server.config.js
scripts.build:assets: mkdir -p dist/server/public/assets/ && mkdir -p dist/server/public/styles && mkdir -p dist/server/public/images && cp -R src/public/assets/* dist/server/public/assets/ && cp src/public/styles/* dist/server/public/styles/ && cp src/public/images/* dist/server/public/images/ && node tools/embedcss.js -i dist/server/public/styles/main.css
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client && npm run build:assets && npm run build:serviceworker
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
